settings.title: Accessibility Statement for 360 Cookware Web Store
settings.details: 360 Cookware is committed to ensuring digital accessibility for people with disabilities. We are continually improving the user experience for everyone, and applying the relevant accessibility standards.

settings.title: Measures to support accessibility
settings.details:
360 Cookware takes the following measures to ensure accessibility of 360 Cookware Web Store:

  • Include accessibility throughout our internal policies.

settings.title: Conformance status
settings.details:
The Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) defines requirements for designers and developers to improve accessibility for people with disabilities. It defines three levels of conformance: Level A, Level AA, and Level AAA. 360 Cookware Web Store is partially conformant with WCAG 2.0 level AA. Partially conformant means that some parts of the content do not fully conform to the accessibility standard. Though we strive to conform to these standards in good faith we can not guarantee all editors of the website are fully trained in ADA compliance.

We welcome your feedback on the accessibility of 360 Cookware Web Store. Please let us know if you encounter accessibility barriers on 360 Cookware Web Store:

  • Phone: +1 (877) 360-8276
  • E-mail: Customer_Inquiries@360Cookware.com
  • Visitor address: 152 E 3rd Ave, Mount Dora, F.L. 32757
  • Postal address: 152 E 3rd Ave, Mount Dora, F.L. 32757
  • Factory address: 245 Trenton Road, West Bend, W.I. 53095

We try to respond to feedback within 2 business days.

settings.title: Compatibility with browsers and assistive technology
settings.details:
360 Cookware Web Store is designed to be compatible with the following assistive technologies:

360 Cookware Web Store is not supported with:

  • browsers older than 3 major versions
  • mobile operating systems older than 3 years

settings.title: Technical specifications
settings.details:
Accessibility of 360 Cookware Web Store relies on the following technologies to work with the particular combination of web browser and any assistive technologies or plugins installed on your computer:

  • HTML
  • CSS
  • JavaScript
  • PHP
  • Shopify Plus

These technologies are relied upon for conformance with the accessibility standards used.

Despite our best efforts to ensure full accessibility of 360cookware.com, there may be some limitations. Below is a description of the known limitations. Please contact us if you observe an issue not listed below.

settings.title: Known limitations for 360cookware.com:
settings.details:
1) Anchor contains no text

This is because of elements on images or SVGs. There is also no way to add a title attribute to the elements, because of Shopify.

2) Img element missing alt attribute

This is because of the way Shopify structures the HTML in some cases. It sets the background image property with CSS, and therefore you can't add an alt text value to it. Alt text values have been added to every image, wherever possible.

3) Need Help button widget

This widget is controlled by and the responsibility of Shopify. We are unable to modify or correct this widget.

4) Homepage Special Offer popup

This widget is controlled by and the responsibility of Shopify. We are unable to modify or correct this widget.

We closely monitor content and will typically repair issues within 30 days. Please use the contact information above if you encounter an issue.
